institutions.name: Bureau of Internal Revenue
institutions.description: Government agency responsible for tax collection in the Philippines

forms.title: Application for Registration for Corporations, Partnerships, and Other Entities
forms.officialTitle: Application for Registration BIR Form No. 1903
forms.description: For Corporations, Partnerships (Taxable/Non-Taxable), Including GAIs, LGUs, Cooperatives and Associations

fields.label: DLN
fields.instructions: To be filled out by BIR

fields.label: TIN to be issued, if applicable
fields.instructions: To be filled out by BIR

fields.label: BIR Registration Date
fields.instructions: To be filled out by BIR

fields.label: RDO Code
fields.instructions: For Taxpayer with existing TIN - To be filled out by BIR

fields.label: Registered Name
fields.instructions: Copy exact name appearing in SEC Certificate of Registration/Charter/Cooperative Development Authority/HLURB

fields.label: Municipality Code
fields.instructions: To be filled out by BIR

fields.label: How much is your expected Annual Gross Sales (GS)?

options.label: Micro – GS is less than Three Million Pesos (P3M)
Small – GS is Three Million Pesos (P3M) to less than 20 Million Pesos (P20M)
Medium – GS is Twenty Million Pesos (P20M) to Less than One Billion Pesos (P1B)
Large – GS is One Billion Pesos (P1B) and above

fields.label: Relationship Name
fields.instructions: For Authorized Representative - If Individual (Last Name) (First Name) (Middle Name) (Suffix) (Nickname) - If Non-Individual Registered Name Represented by:

fields.label: PSIC Code
fields.instructions: To be filled out by BIR

fields.label: Incentive Granted
fields.placeholder: e.g., Exempt from IT, VAT, etc.

fields.label: Facility Details
Facility Code
fields.instructions: To be filled out by BIR

options.label: RP - Real Property for Lease with No Sales Activity

fields.instructions: PP-Place of Production/Plant; SP-Storage Place; WH-Warehouse; SR-Showroom; GG-Garage; BT-Bus Terminal; RP-Real Property for Lease with No Sales Activity

fields.label: Tax Types
fields.instructions: this portion determines your tax liability/ies - To be filled out by BIR

types: On Interest Paid on Deposits and Yield on Deposits/Substitutes

fields.label: Do you intend to use BIR Printed Invoices?
Name
fields.instructions: If Individual, Last Name, First Name, Middle Name, Suffix. If Non-Individual, Registered Name

sections.name: Part IX – Withholding Agent/Accredited Tax Agent Information

fields.label: Withholding Agent/Accredited Tax Agent's Name
fields.instructions: If Individual, Last Name, First Name, Middle Name, Suffix. If Non-Individual, Registered Name (if different from taxpayer)

fields.label: Declaration
fields.text: I/We declare, under the penalties of perjury that this application has been made in good faith, verified by me/us and to the best of my/our knowledge and belief, is true and correct, pursuant to the provisions of the National Internal Revenue Code, as amended, and the regulations issued under the authority thereof. Further, I/we give my/our consent to the processing of my information as contemplated under the Data Privacy Act of 2012 (R.A. No. 10173) for legitimate and lawful purposes.

components.label: President/Vice President/Principal Officer/Accredited Tax Agent/Authorized Representative/Taxpayer Signature
Tax Agent Accreditation No./Attorney's Roll No. (if applicable)

sections.name: Part X – Payment Order Form for New Business Registrant
sections.instructions: For BIR Payment Acceptance Only. Not to be filed in AABs

fields.label: Payment Details
fields.instructions: To be filled out by BIR-Revenue Collection Officer

businessRules.rule: Government entities have specific charter requirements

required: SEC Certificate of Incorporation or Certificate of Recording (Partnership) or License to Do Business in the Philippines (Foreign Corporation) or CDA Certificate of Registration or HLURB Certificate of Registration or DOLE Certificate of Registration
Articles of Incorporation or Articles of Partnership or Articles of Cooperation or Articles of Association or Constitution and by-laws
BIR Printed Invoices or Final clear sample of OWN Invoices
Apostilled official documentation issued by an authorized government body (e.g., Articles of Incorporation, Certificate of Tax Residency)
Unit or Agency's Charter or Proof of Registration
Endorsement from Department of Foreign Affairs (DFA)
Consularized/Apostilled Host Agreement or any international agreement
Apostilled Board Resolution/Secretary's Certificate indicating the purpose and name of authorized representative
Any government-issued ID of one of the signatory and authorized representative

fees.description: Loose Stamp/s to be affixed on the Certificate of Registration

specificRules.entity_types: This form covers corporations, partnerships, cooperatives, government agencies, and other legal entities
specificRules.stockholder_requirements: Minimum of 1 stockholder/partner/member required, with support for multiple entries
specificRules.fiscal_year_support: Support for both calendar year and fiscal year accounting periods
